decoworld.server

Class ManagementApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.ManagementApi

  • public class ManagementApi
extends java.lang.Object
    A class accessible by all so that common game management tasks can be easily accessed and completed. TODO: add return types and implement methods.
